sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./App.css"; class App extends Component { state = { toggleMenu: "nav", headerColor: "", contact: "" }; /* FUNCTION THAT LISTENS TO SCROLL AND CHANGES THE BACKGROUND COLOR OF NAV BAR BASED ON WHERE YOU ARE */ listenScrollEvent = e => { if (window.scrollY > 600) { this.setState({ headerColor: "#07171C" }); } else { this.setState({ headerColor: "" }); } }; /* FUNCTION THAT LISTENS TO SCROLL AND HIDES THE FLOATING CONTACT BUTTON(BOTTOM RIGHT OF SCREEN) BASED ON WHERE YOU ARE */ contactButton = e => { if (window.scrollY > 3800) { this.setState({ contact: "hidden" }); } else { this.setState({ contact: "" }); } }; /* CALLS LISTENER EVENT FUNCTION AS SOON AS COMPONENT MOUNTS */ componentDidMount = () => { window.addEventListener("scroll", this.listenScrollEvent); window.addEventListener("scroll", this.contactButton); }; /** TOGGLE FUNCTION FOR MOBILE NAV BAR */ toggleMobileMenu = () => { if (this.state.toggleMenu === "nav") { this.setState({ toggleMenu: "active" }); } else this.setState({ toggleMenu: "nav" }); }; /** RESETING STATE WHEN THE USER TOGGLES MOBILE NAV AGAIN */ toggleBack = () => { if (this.state.toggleMenu === "active") { this.setState({ toggleMenu: "nav" }); } }; render() { return (
{/* HERO SECTION */}
  • Home
  • About
  • Projects
  • Contact

    • Web Developer

    Based out of Rockville, MD. Specializing in custom websites using React, Vanilla Javascript and Wordpress. If you are a business seeking a web presence or an employer looking to hire, you can get in touch with me{" "} here .

    I need a website Resume
    {/* PROJECT SECTION START */} {/* PROJECT ALVIAL AND ASSOCIATES */}

    Alvial & Associates

    Alvial and Associates is a wordpress website for a General Contrator. I built this website from scratch using the Divi theme and a variety of plugins.

    Wordpress Instagram Feed CSS JQuery
    {/* Project 699fourtheenth.com */}

    699Fourteenth

    699Fourteenth is a Wordpress website I updated for a client that offers prime office space in Washington DC. This website was created using Encode theme.

    Wordpress CSS Encode Theme
    {/* PROJECT CENTRO EVANGELISTICO */}

    CE Church(Non-profit)

    A wordpress website for a non-profit organization and community of believers. This website was created using a Material Design based theme.

    Wordpress Google Maps Material Design HTML
    {/* PROJECT ATEBALL */}

    Ate-Ball

    My latest Project where I partnered with Luis Ortiz to create a React app that will solve the world problem risen by the question "where do you want to go eat?" Using geolocation, Zomatos and Yelp Fusion Api I present to you, Ateball.

    React CSS Mongo Yelp Node Geolocation
    {/* PROJECT PIXASHARE */}

    PixaShare

    PixaShare is an application I made to implement the MEHN stack(MongoDB, Express, Handlebars, Node). I created it using these technologies:

    Bootstrap HTML Handlebars Express Node Mongo
    {/* PROJECT REBECA PORTFOLIO */}

    Sweetest-Memories

    This is a website I update and maintain. I created this website using a bootstrap theme from bootstrapmade for a Photographer using the following technologies:

    Bootstrap HTML JavaScript
    {/* PROJECT TRIVIA */}

    Fron-Trivia

    Fron-trivia is a game I made to help test my HTML, CSS, and JavaScript knowledge using the following technologies:

    HTML CSS JavaScript
    {/* BIO SECTION */} Contact

    About

    I’m Juan! A Software Engineer who writes clean, efficient and reusable code. My attention to detail, diagnostic skills and team work are essential to my approach, and guided me during my Army service. I am able to adapt and overcome any problem at hand.

    {/* CONTACT SECTION */}

    Contact

    {/* FOOTER SECTION WITH SOCIAL MEDIA LINKS */}

    © All Rights Reserved

    Created and Designed by Juan Baires Using React

    ); } } export default App;
